db:abstract.db:para: Demonstrates how to embed dialogs into a graphics view.

db:article.db:programlisting:
QT += widgets
SOURCES += main.cpp SOURCES += customproxy.cpp embeddeddialog.cpp HEADERS += customproxy.h embeddeddialog.h
FORMS += embeddeddialog.ui RESOURCES += embeddeddialogs.qrc
build_all:!build_pass { CONFIG -= build_all CONFIG += release }
# install target.path = $$[QT_INSTALL_EXAMPLES]/widgets/graphicsview/embeddeddialogs INSTALLS += target
